title: Passion
body: Are you excited to dedicate time, energy, and compassion towards understanding and building with communities?

title: Growth
body: Do you actively seek out ways to grow? Do you take action to work towards that growth?

title: Resourcefulness
body: Are you self-motivated and driven? Do you adapt to new environments and challenges?

title: Attitude
body: Do you approach problems and challenges with an open mind? Are you able to work through unfamiliar situations?

title: Teamwork
body: Do you enjoy collaborating and learning with others? Do you value others' perspectives and experiences?

title: Culture
body: Are you looking forward to developing meaningful relationships with our members and partners beyond the work environment?
